title: Using Open Source Libraries As Educational Tools
description: As developers, we use open source libraries frequently to speed up development and avoid reinventing the wheel. However, open source libraries are more than just a tool for development - they can also be used as an educational aid. In this talk, I will share how I use open source tools to improve my programming skills and get a better understanding of the fundamentals of frontend development.
speaker: js20_carl_mungazi
